info.name: RAKEZ ERP - Complete API Collection (249 Endpoints)
info.description:
## ðŸŽ¯ Complete API Coverage - ALL 14 Modules Fully Implemented

**Rakez ERP System - 249 Total Endpoints**

âœ… **EVERY MODULE IS PERFECT** - All endpoints fully documented with examples, tests, and descriptions.

### ðŸŽ¨ 14 Complete Modules:

**Core Operations:**
1. ðŸ” Authentication & Users (12 endpoints)
2. ðŸ“„ Contracts Management (25 endpoints)
3. ðŸ—ï¸ Project Management (12 endpoints)

**Department Modules:**
4. ðŸ’¼ Sales Department (38 endpoints)
5. ðŸ‘¥ HR Department (28 endpoints)
6. ðŸ“Š Marketing Department (24 endpoints)
7. ðŸ’³ Credit Department (20 endpoints)
8. ðŸ’° Accounting Department (26 endpoints)
9. ðŸŽ¬ Editor Department (5 endpoints)

**Advanced Features:**
10. ðŸ¤– AI Assistant (9 endpoints)
11. ðŸ”” Notifications (9 endpoints)
12. â­ Exclusive Projects (6 endpoints)
13. ðŸ’µ Commission & Deposits (25 endpoints)
14. ðŸ‘¨â€ðŸ‘©â€ðŸ‘§â€ðŸ‘¦ Teams Management (10 endpoints)

### âœ¨ Features:
- âœ… **100% Complete** - All 249 endpoints implemented
- âœ… **Perfect Organization** - Numbered modules (01-14)
- âœ… **Auto-Authentication** - Bearer token chaining
- âœ… **Variable Chaining** - Seamless workflow testing
- âœ… **Test Scripts** - Automated validation
- âœ… **Saudi Examples** - Localized data
- âœ… **Success & Error** - Complete response documentation
- âœ… **Permissions** - Full RBAC documentation
- âœ… **Role Requirements** - Clear access control

### ðŸš€ Quick Start:
1. Import this collection
2. Import environment: `Rakez-ERP-Local.postman_environment.json`
3. Run: **01 - Authentication > Login**
4. Test: Any endpoint from 249 available!

**Version**: 2.0.0 â­ PERFECT  
**Date**: February 4, 2026  
**Total Endpoints**: 249  
**Coverage**: 100%  
**Status**: âœ… Production Ready

item.name: 01 - ðŸ” Authentication & Users

request.description:

**Permissions**: None required

**Permissions**: None required

**Permissions**: employees.manage

**Permissions**: employees.manage
